name: Go Kart Survival
description:
Introduction

Go Kart Survival player drives small karting race car and game is meme racing game. Only target to survive with different tracks under limited time. Tracks contains lot of obstacles that player have to avoid and ramps, where player have to jump. Go Kart Survival not contain realistic physics. This race game is not too serious so just drive fast and beat the clock

Features:
- Karting race car
- 10 tracks
